MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginGetToken (string appliesTo, string action, bool bypassCache, TimeSpan timeout, AsyncCallback callback, object state);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginGetToken(string appliesTo, string action, bool bypassCache, valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout, class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed

Docs.param: The URI which the access token applies to.
The request action.
true to ignore existing token information in the cache; false to use the token information in the cache.
The time span that specifies the timeout value for the message that gets the security token.
An delegate that references the method to invoke when the operation is complete.
A user-defined object that contains state information about the asynchronous operation.
Docs.summary: Begins an asynchronous operation to get a security token.
Docs.returns: An object that references the asynchronous operation to get a token.

MemberSignature.Value: protected abstract IAsyncResult OnBeginGetToken (string appliesTo, string action, TimeSpan timeout, AsyncCallback callback, object state);

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IAsyncResult OnBeginGetToken(string appliesTo, string action, valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout, class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed

Docs.param: The URI for which the token will be acquired.
The claim required for the token being requested
The amount of time that can be spent acquiring a token, before a TimeoutException should be thrown.
The AsyncCallback to invoke after a token has been acquired.
An object that should be passed to the AsyncCallback if this method completes asynchronously.
Docs.summary: Acquire a SecurityToken asynchronously.
Docs.returns: An IAsyncResult representing the asynchronous token acquisition.

Docs.param: An IAsyncResult object returned by OnBeginGetToken representing the token acquisition request.
A DateTime object representing when the returned SecurityToken can be safely cached until.
Docs.summary: Wait for a call to OnBeginGetToken to complete, and return the associated error or SecurityToken for the asynchronous request.
Docs.returns: The SecurityToken resulting from the request.
